message.body: When you get home can you help me buy tickets for a concert?
Can we drive to the dollar store now?

I know I Shouldn't text you at night but this is very important all my rides backed out and I have no way of getting to school...if I don't find anything by tomorrow morning can you please take me?? I will pay you!! I will give you five massages and one hour of chores!!!
Why can't you take the bus.

I have too much stuff i need to take it won't fit on the bus. But I can try? I don't know I just don't feel comfortable with that because I don't know what time it comes or anything. But if you feel that it will really hurt you I will try to take the bs
Please take the bus. I am miserable because you woke me up right now. It is enough. Be reasonable and do the right thing. Good night.
Pleae? I can't figure out how to take the bus
Do you need a ride home
